item.description:
This is a pay-your-own-way event. Since I will need to make a reservation, RSVPs will close 24 hours prior.

Come out, have dinner, and sing with us at Samba's in Framingham! Samba's is a Steak and Sushi restaurant and bar featuring hibachi grills. We'll be meeting at 8PM for a nice dinner and drinks.

There is no requirement to sing -- come cheer on the rest of the TFS crowd! Karaoke starts at 9PM in the bar area, and in-between singers the DJ spins hot dance music so you can shake your groove thing if the mood strikes you!

http://www.sambaframi...
item.name: Dinner and Karaoke/ Dancing at Samba's Framingham
